commentQueryAllSQL: select * from comment where article_id='<%= article_id %>'
commentQueryByArticleIdSQL: select count(*) as count from comment where article_id='<%= article_id %>'
commentAddSQL: insert into comment(user_id, article_id, prev_id, content) values('<%= user_id %>','<%= article_id %>','<%= prev_id %>','<%= content %>')
commentDeleteSQL: delete from comment where id='<%= id %>'
